description: Coach Tom Mitchell is giving Scott Avery handball lessons when this scene opens in the lockerroom.  When they hit the showers Scott comments on Tom's big rock hard dick.  Tom informs him that it's all because of Scott's nice ass.  Tom starts telling Scott what to do in the showers without any hesitation from Scott.  Coach Bull Matthews (in a non-sexual role) watches Tom fuck Scott unknown to the both of them.
title: Spring Training, Scene #02
